reasoning: The screenshot shows a clear 404 error page when attempting to access article detail pages. The Wiki module is installed (WIKI TEST menu visible) and code review confirms editing functionality exists, but URL routing is broken preventing any article access - this is a real functional failure.

The Wiki module is visibly installed in navigation, but article detail page URLs are not routing correctly, returning 404 errors instead of the expected article editor with editable Title field.
